subCategoriesOrder.ManufacturerSpec: This describes the manufacturer specifications for this component (i.e., manufacturer name, model designation and serial number).
subCategoriesOrder.Detector: This describes a detector available for this instrument. An instrument may have more than one detector of different types, such as photomultiplier, or camera. The Detector ID can be used as a reference within the Channel element in the Image element. The values stored in Detector represent the fixed values, variable values modified during the acquisition go in DetectorSettings.
subCategoriesOrder.Camera: This describes a camera device available for this instrument. A camera is device that converts optical brightness into an electrical signal using a CCD(a semiconductor chip, which converts the intensity of light falling onto its surface at different points into a charge) and then reproduces an image of the specimen.  An instrument may have more than one camera of different types, such as EMCCD, intensified EMCCD, CMOS, or analog video.
subCategoriesOrder.WavelengthRange: This records a range of wavelengths this device is designed for according to the manufacturer. Multiple of this elements may be used.
subCategoriesOrder.RelayLens: This is a reference to a lens positioned at the mount connecting this detector to the microscope body.

Type.description: The type of CCD camera used.

Illumination.description: The type of illumination the camera chip receives

ArrayWidth.description: The width of this camera chip expressed in pixel.

ArrayHeight.description: The height of this camera chip expressed in pixel.

PixelWidth.description: The physical width of each pixel.

PixelHeight.description: The physical height of each pixel.

ImageWidth.description: The width of the image generated by the camera.

ImageHeight.description: The width of the image generated by the camera.

PixelWellCapacity.description: The maximum amount of charge each pixel well can hold, measured in electron counts.

RegisterWellCapacity.description: The maximum amount of charge each register well can hold, measured in electron counts.

VerticalClockSpeed.description: The maximal speed each vertical colunm of pixels in the camera chip, can be shifted down and read.

MaximumFrameRate.description: The maximal rate at which this camera can acquire a single frame.

MaximumReadoutRate.description: The maximal pixel read out rate allowed by this camera.

Name.description: A user defined name for this component.

ID.description: A unique identifier for this component.

Gain.description: The analog gain is the conversion unit for this detector, as specified by the manufacturer. It specifies how many electrons correspond to 1 signal unit. It is expressed in e-/Analog-to-Digit-Unit (ADU).

Mount.description: The type of mount used to connect this detector to the microscope body.

ReadNoise.description: The read noise of this detector, as specified by the manufacturer. Read noise includes thermal noise build-up and clock induced charge. This is generally expressed in e- rms.

DetectorNoiseModel.description: The type of noise associated with this detector.

DarkCurrentRate.description: The dark current rate of this detector as specified by the manufacturer. The dark current rate is the median current detected in the absence of light. Generally expressed in e-/pixel/sec.

PeakWavelength.description: The wavelength associated with maximum light intensity detected by this device.

QuantumEfficiencyatPeakWavelength.description: The quantum efficiency observed at peak wavelength, according to the manufacturer. Quantum Efficiency is generally defined as is the ratio of incident photon to converted electrons. Typically expressed as a number between 0 and 1.

AmbientOperatingTemperature.description: The ambient temperature at which this detector is designed to operate, according to the manufactuer.

AmbientOperatingHumidity.description: The ambient humidity at which this detector is designed to operate, according to the manufactuer.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of this component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of this component

SpecsFile.description: Provide the location of a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer.

WavelengthRange.description: This records a range of wavelengths this device is designed for, according to the manufacturer. Multiple of this elements may be used.

CutIn.description: CutIn is the wavelength below which the response rate is below 50%.

CutOut.description: CutOut is the wavelength above which the response rate is below 50%.

WavelenghtProfile.description: The location of a file containing the wavelenght profile of this component.

RelayLens.description: This is a reference to a lens positioned at the mount connecting this detector to the microscope body.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: This is a simple multi-line comment or annotation describing this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
